product_name: Riverside Car Top Universal Kayak Carrier
long_description: Provides an economical and simple method for transporting all kayaks, surfboards and sailboards. Pair of closed-cell foam blocks are made from cfc- and hcfc-free foam. Re-usable mesh storage bag has printed instructions stitched to it for convenient reference.
short_description: Provides an economical and simple method for transporting all kayaks, surfboards and sailboards.
